parameters.name: HostGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the asset group to query.

> You can call the [ListHostGroups](~~204509~~) operation to query the asset group ID.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host whose asset group you want to query.

> You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the bastion host ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host whose asset group you want to query.

> For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, [see Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
